attributes.action: To offer free public transport to all students who are in full time education.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the government to introduce free public transport for all students who  are in full time education. Currently this is only available to those who are under 16. At the very least, it should be right that full time students should be allowed to use child fares, as they do not have the income which allows them to realistically purchase adult fares when their budgets are not that great.
